enWisdom: The intelligent one is grieved, sorrowful

Wisdom: تَجَرَّعِ الْغُصَصَ فَإِنِّي لَمْ أَرَ جُرْعَةً أَحْلَى مِنْهَا عَاقِبَةً وَلَا أَلَذَّ مَغَبَّةً
enWisdom: Gulp down the agonies, for indeed I have not seen any drink that is sweeter than this in outcome, nor more tasteful in effect

Wisdom: كَمْ مِنْ حَزِينٍ وَفَدَ بِهِ حُزْنُهُ عَلَى سُرُورِ الْأَبَدِ
enWisdom: How many a sorrowful person has been driven to perpetual bliss by his sorrow
For every distress there is a relief

Wisdom: يَنْبَغِي لِمَنْ عَرَفَ نَفْسَهُ أَنْ لَا يُفَارِقَهُ الْحُزْنُ وَالْحَذَرُ
enWisdom: It behoves the one who knows himself not to separate [himself] from sadness and caution
